name: pnp-devproxy-url-discovery-starter
title: Find which APIs your app calls
shortDescription: Helps developers discover which URLs their app calls to configure Dev Proxy. Zero-config starting point to find all APIs your app uses automatically.
longDescription: Helps developers discover which URLs their app calls to configure Dev Proxy. Zero-config starting point to find all APIs your app uses automatically.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy discovering URLs from intercepted traffic

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Discover URLs to watch
references.description: Learn how to use Dev Proxy to discover which URLs your app calls.

references.name: Intercept requests from specific processes
references.description: Learn how to intercept requests from specific processes using Dev Proxy.
